mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.aid, o.receiver, a.phone, o.address, o.paytype, o.total, o.pdate, o.ddate, o.status FROM ordered o JOIN account a ON a.id = o.aid ORDER BY o.id DESC

SELECT d.id, d.oid, d.pid, p.title AS pname, d.qty, p.price, d.status FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON p.id = d.pid WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY d.id
SELECT o.id, o.aid, o.receiver, a.phone, o.address, o.paytype, o.total, o.pdate, o.ddate, o.status FROM ordered o JOIN account a ON a.id = o.aid WHERE o.status = #{status} ORDER BY o.id DESC

SELECT d.id, d.oid, d.pid, p.title AS pname, d.qty, p.price, d.status FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON p.id = d.pid WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY d.id
SELECT ordered_seq.NEXTVAL AS seq_order FROM dual
SELECT order_detail_seq.NEXTVAL AS seq_order_detail FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordered(id, aid, receiver, address, paytype, total, pdate, ddate) VALUES(#{id}, #{aid}, #{receiver}, #{address}, #{paytype}, #{total}, #{pdate}, #{ddate})
INSERT INTO order_detail(id, oid, pid, qty, price) VALUES(#{id}, #{oid}, #{pid}, #{qty}, #{price})
